---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement
title: "[FEATURE]"
labels: enhancement
assignees: 
---

## Summary
Briefly describe the feature you are requesting.  
Example: *"Add support for more types and literals in the compiler."*

## Motivation
Why is this feature important? What problem does it solve? Are others wanting this?

## Proposed Implementation
- How do you imagine this feature working?
- Any details about APIs, commands, or behavior.
- Optional: pseudocode or examples.

## Alternatives Considered
- Are there other ways to achieve the same goal?
- Why are they not sufficient?

## Additional Information
Anything else that might help (mockups, features from other languages, references, links, related issues, etc.).
